name: double_index_at_region_bottom
description: Two consecutive IND at bottom of scroll region scrolls region twice; rows outside untouched
comment: Fill A-E. DECSTBM(2,5) → region rows 1-4. CUP(5,1) → (4,0). IND → scroll: row 1←C, 2←D, 3←E, 4←blank. IND again → scroll: row 1←D, 2←E, 3←blank, 4←blank. Print 'Z'. Row 0=A untouched.
